title: You kinda have to answer this poll
body:
It's really stupid that people say:
'MY COUNTRY IS BETTER!'
or
'New Zealand can suck a dick'
or
'Australia = racism, nothing else, everyone there are fukwits'

So my poll question is:
Which country do YOU think is better??
New Zealand
or
Australia

replies.body:
Well, you'd have to consider the pros and cons of each. For example:

| |Australia|New Zealand|
|:-----|:-----:|:-----:|
|Pros|Steve Irwin was here.|Lord of the Rings!|
||Lot's of unique wildlife.|Lord of the Rings!!!|
|Cons|Everything's trying to kill you.|People might think you're a "sheep shagger".|
||AUD is in a bad place.|NZD is even worse.|

I agree with Tomato though. Arguably, NZ is better.
######Just to be clear, I don't really know much about either.
